Posts.Content: Hello everyone, my wife starts chemo today. 18 weeks of Paclitaxol. She is 50 and has Stage 4 Breast Cancer which has spread to her bones, liver and a kidney. Our kids are 16, 14 and 11. It is her first chemo - only diagnosed recently. One day at a time. Best wishes to all.Â
Posts.Title: * * * MARCH 2017 Breast cancer chemo club * * *
